dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3045 IH: Eastern Legacy Extension Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Messer introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the National Trails System Act to extend the Lewis and Clark National Historic Trail, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Eastern Legacy Extension Act.

section.header: Extension of Lewis and Clark National Historic Trail

subsection.text: Section 5(a)(6) of the National Trails System Act (16 U.S.C. 1244(a)(6)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking three thousand seven hundred and inserting 4,900;
by striking Wood River, Illinois, and inserting the Ohio River in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania,; and
by striking maps identified as, Vicinity Map, Lewis and Clark Trail study report dated April 1977. and inserting the map entitled ____, dated ____, and numbered ____.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall take effect on the date that is 60 days after the date of the enactment of this Act.
